products.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold scarlet red roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Bella Blackout Ruby Red Roller Blind
products.description: At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This tropical roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Blackout Chilli Red Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This firey chilli red roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Geisha Red Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches with a hint of red. Cherry blossom blackout geisha red blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. Product id: db-rbx2241 fabric colour: geisha red material: 80% polyester 20% cotton lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes cherry blossom blackout geisha red roller blind in red/pink.
